title: The Earthquake in Chile
description: A story about two lovers caught up in the chaos of the 1647 Santiago earthquake in Chile!——The Earthquake in Chile (1807) by Heinrich Von Kleist (1777-1811) is a German short story that questions theodicy and explores the processes of interpretation by which the survivors of the earthquake desperately need to give meaning to the cataclysm that has befallen them and to their survival – and the practical consequences of those interpretations.
author: Heinrich von Kleist
